Karin

messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] Foreigners
messages.msgSnippet: ... Or, in the words of the Colonel from the movie Chicken Run, in reference to the American Rooster Rocky Roads (voiced by Mel Gibson): Pushy Americans!
messages.messageBody:
>All these British Women who married Americans!! My
>mother (who grew up during WW2) always said they came
>over and stole our women :-)
>Shyrley in exile

Or, in the words of the "Colonel" from the movie
Chicken Run, in reference to the American Rooster
Rocky Roads (voiced by Mel Gibson):
"Pushy Americans! Always overpaid, oversexed, and
over here!"

Nanci K.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Foreigners
messages.msgSnippet: I last lived in the UK at Mildenhall and used to go to Cambridge a lot to shop. Very nice but awful parking. Don t remember big noses in Derbyshire just some
messages.messageBody:
I last lived in the UK at Mildenhall and used to go to Cambridge a lot to
shop. Very nice but awful parking.
Don't remember big noses in Derbyshire just some kind of caves with blue
stones -- it was one of those memorable school field trip.

Kate

At 05:41 PM 3/20/02 -0700, you wrote:
> I'm from Cambridge... living in the desert heat of Tucson (for now)....
> Love Cornwall... Relatives are from Derbyshire where they all seem to wear
> flat caps and have big noses... But I'm sure that's a generalization
> (LOL)....
>
> Dawn

messages.subject: Re: Foreigners
messages.msgSnippet: ... (who grew up during ... That s funny, I m the other way around. I m an American who married a Brit and I ve met another one of the same who lives a few
messages.messageBody:
> All these British Women who married Americans!! My mother
(who grew up during
> WW2) always said they came over and stole our women :-)
>
> Shyrley in exile

That's funny, I'm the other way around. I'm an American who
married a Brit and I've met another one of the same who lives a
few miles away and has two girls. We've become great friends,
and even though her girls go to public school, they're really
sweet kids <g>.

Meghan

I'm from Cambridge... living in the desert heat of Tucson (for now)....
Love Cornwall... Relatives are from Derbyshire where they all seem to wear
flat caps and have big noses... But I'm sure that's a generalization
(LOL)....

Dawn
